videos.title: Creating a disease model from scratch
videos.short_description: Let's create a simple infectious disease model from scratch.

videos.title: Turtle geometry
videos.short_description: Learn how to use turtles to draw shapes, simple and complex.

videos.title: Information spread over a network
videos.short_description: Create a network of turtles in NetLogo and move information over it.

videos.title: What is emergence?
videos.short_description: NetLogo is a powerful tool to model emergence? But what is emergence?
